channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Host Agent (SAPOSCOL)

item.title: CVE-2022-35295|2024-08-03T09:36:44.334Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20host%20agent%20%28saposcol%29
item.description: In SAP Host Agent (SAPOSCOL) - version 7.22, an attacker may use files created by saposcol to escalate privileges for themselves.
